title: Ticket #1527: MyProxy passphrase in separate file
description: When supplying the passphrase for a MyProxy server as part of a job submission, the passphrase is either in the submit file or given on the command line. Igor Sfiligoi would like an option to supply the passphrase in a separate file, which can have more restricted permissions.
remarks:
